extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: Channel
attributes.description: The Channel attribute indicates the current operating channel.

attributes.name: Routing-Role
attributes.description: The Routing-Role attribute indicates the current routing role of the device.

attributes.name: Network-Name
attributes.description: The Network-Name attribute indicates the name of the network.

attributes.name: PanId
attributes.description: The PanId attribute indicates the PAN ID of the network.

attributes.name: Extended-PanId
attributes.description: The Extended-PanId attribute indicates the extended PAN ID of the network.

attributes.name: MeshLocalPrefix
attributes.description: The MeshLocalPrefix attribute indicates the mesh-local prefix of the network.

attributes.name: OverrunCount
attributes.description: The OverrunCount attribute indicates the number of overruns.

attributes.name: NeighborTable
attributes.description: The NeighborTable attribute provides a list of neighbor table entries.

attributes.name: RouteTable
attributes.description: The RouteTable attribute provides a list of route table entries.

attributes.name: PartitionId
attributes.description: The PartitionId attribute indicates the partition ID of the network.

attributes.name: Weighting
attributes.description: The Weighting attribute indicates the weighting of the device.

attributes.name: DataVersion
attributes.description: The DataVersion attribute indicates the data version of the network.

attributes.name: StableDataVersion
attributes.description: The StableDataVersion attribute indicates the stable data version of the network.

attributes.name: LeaderRouterId
attributes.description: The LeaderRouterId attribute indicates the router ID of the leader.

attributes.name: DetachedRoleCount
attributes.description: The DetachedRoleCount attribute indicates the number of times the device has been in the detached role.

attributes.name: ChildRoleCount
attributes.description: The ChildRoleCount attribute indicates the number of times the device has been in the child role.

attributes.name: RouterRoleCount
attributes.description: The RouterRoleCount attribute indicates the number of times the device has been in the router role.

attributes.name: LeaderRoleCount
attributes.description: The LeaderRoleCount attribute indicates the number of times the device has been in the leader role.

attributes.name: AttachAttemptCount
attributes.description: The AttachAttemptCount attribute indicates the number of attach attempts made by the device.

attributes.name: PartitionIdChangeCount
attributes.description: The PartitionIdChangeCount attribute indicates the number of times the partition ID has changed.

attributes.name: BetterPartitionAttachAttemptCount
attributes.description: The BetterPartitionAttachAttemptCount attribute indicates the number of attempts to attach to a better partition.

attributes.name: ParentChangeCount
attributes.description: The ParentChangeCount attribute indicates the number of times the parent has changed.

attributes.name: TxTotalCount
attributes.description: The TxTotalCount attribute indicates the total number of transmissions.

attributes.name: TxUnicastCount
attributes.description: The TxUnicastCount attribute indicates the total number of unicast transmissions.

attributes.name: TxBroadcastCount
attributes.description: The TxBroadcastCount attribute indicates the total number of broadcast transmissions.

attributes.name: TxAckRequestedCount
attributes.description: The TxAckRequestedCount attribute indicates the number of transmissions where an acknowledgment was requested.

attributes.name: TxAckedCount
attributes.description: The TxAckedCount attribute indicates the number of transmissions that were acknowledged.

attributes.name: TxNoAckRequestedCount
attributes.description: The TxNoAckRequestedCount attribute indicates the number of transmissions where no acknowledgment was requested.

attributes.name: TxDataCount
attributes.description: The TxDataCount attribute indicates the number of data transmissions.

attributes.name: TxDataPollCount
attributes.description: The TxDataPollCount attribute indicates the number of data poll transmissions.

attributes.name: TxBeaconRequestCount
attributes.description: The TxBeaconRequestCount attribute indicates the number of beacon request transmissions.

attributes.name: TxOtherCount
attributes.description: The TxOtherCount attribute indicates the number of other transmissions.

attributes.name: TxRetryCount
attributes.description: The TxRetryCount attribute indicates the number of transmission retries.

attributes.name: TxDirectMaxRetryExpiryCount
attributes.description: The TxDirectMaxRetryExpiryCount attribute indicates the number of direct transmission retries that reached the maximum retry limit.

attributes.name: TxIndirectMaxRetryExpiryCount
attributes.description: The TxIndirectMaxRetryExpiryCount attribute indicates the number of indirect transmission retries that reached the maximum retry limit.

attributes.name: TxErrCcaCount
attributes.description: The TxErrCcaCount attribute indicates the number of CCA errors during transmission.

attributes.name: TxErrAbortCount
attributes.description: The TxErrAbortCount attribute indicates the number of aborted transmissions.

attributes.name: TxErrBusyChannelCount
attributes.description: The TxErrBusyChannelCount attribute indicates the number of transmissions that failed due to a busy channel.

attributes.name: RxTotalCount
attributes.description: The RxTotalCount attribute indicates the total number of receptions.

attributes.name: RxUnicastCount
attributes.description: The RxUnicastCount attribute indicates the total number of unicast receptions.

attributes.name: RxBroadcastCount
attributes.description: The RxBroadcastCount attribute indicates the total number of broadcast receptions.

attributes.name: RxDataCount
attributes.description: The RxDataCount attribute indicates the number of data receptions.

attributes.name: RxBeaconCount
attributes.description: The RxBeaconCount attribute indicates the number of beacon receptions.

attributes.name: RxBeaconRequestCount
attributes.description: The RxBeaconRequestCount attribute indicates the number of beacon request receptions.

attributes.name: RxOtherCount
attributes.description: The RxOtherCount attribute indicates the number of other receptions.

attributes.name: RxAddressFilteredCount
attributes.description: The RxAddressFilteredCount attribute indicates the number of receptions filtered by address.

attributes.name: RxDestAddrFilteredCount
attributes.description: The RxDestAddrFilteredCount attribute indicates the number of receptions filtered by destination address.

attributes.name: RxDuplicatedCount
attributes.description: The RxDuplicatedCount attribute indicates the number of duplicated receptions.

attributes.name: RxErrNoFrameCount
attributes.description: The RxErrNoFrameCount attribute indicates the number of receptions with no frame.

attributes.name: RxErrUnknownNeighborCount
attributes.description: The RxErrUnknownNeighborCount attribute indicates the number of receptions from unknown neighbors.

attributes.name: RxErrInvalidSrcAddrCount
attributes.description: The RxErrInvalidSrcAddrCount attribute indicates the number of receptions with invalid source addresses.

attributes.name: RxErrSecCount
attributes.description: The RxErrSecCount attribute indicates the number of receptions with security errors.

attributes.name: RxErrFcsCount
attributes.description: The RxErrFcsCount attribute indicates the number of receptions with FCS errors.

attributes.name: RxErrOtherCount
attributes.description: The RxErrOtherCount attribute indicates the number of receptions with other errors.

attributes.name: ActiveTimestamp
attributes.description: The ActiveTimestamp attribute indicates the active timestamp of the network.

attributes.name: PendingTimestamp
attributes.description: The PendingTimestamp attribute indicates the pending timestamp of the network.

attributes.name: Delay
attributes.description: The Delay attribute indicates the delay time for pending operations.

attributes.name: SecurityPolicy
attributes.description: The SecurityPolicy attribute indicates the security policy of the network.

attributes.name: ChannelPage0Mask
attributes.description: The ChannelPage0Mask attribute indicates the channel page 0 mask of the network.

attributes.name: ActiveNetworkFaultsList
attributes.description: The ActiveNetworkFaultsList attribute indicates the list of active network faults.

attributes.name: Rloc16
attributes.description: The Rloc16 attribute indicates the RLOC16 of the device.

attributes.name: ExtAddress
attributes.description: The ExtAddress attribute indicates the extended address of the device.

attributes.name: Rloc16
attributes.description: The Rloc16 attribute indicates the RLOC16 of the device.

parameters.description: Receipt of this command SHALL reset the following values which track high and lower watermarks.
The ConnectionStatus Event SHALL indicate that a Node’s connection status to a Thread network has changed.
Reports changes in network fault status
